title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 102.5 - Reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 102.5 - Reports

State Regulations

In addition to the reports required under section
102.3
of this Part, each utility
shall also report semiannually transmission facilities constructed in the
preceding six months but less than one mile in length. The report shall specify
which of said overhead transmission facilities were constructed in areas listed
under section
102.3
(a) of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
102.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
